function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Converting outcome measures to daily basis using inaccurate formulas or methods may result in flawed data analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data for estimating the effect size","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Majority of studies from a limited number of countries us and china","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Observational quasi-experimental study designs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in covid-19 indicators during and after lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slight effects of lockdown on decreasing case growth rate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effectiveness in reducing daily incidence rates and death trends","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective decrease in mortality growth rate after lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of individual social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heterogeneity and publication bias in meta-analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible publication bias in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High heterogeneity among studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Missed cases in the trim-and-fill test","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Late adoption of nphis leading to icu saturation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in measuring unique impact of specific nphis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic impact of early nphis such as lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Demographic characteristics and population densities impacting the effectiveness of nphis in controlling covid-19 spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited number of studies considering demographic and geographic factors in analyzing the effectiveness of nphis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the role of health data infrastructures in evaluating nphi effectiveness in pandemics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Under-reporting of data due to mass panic in low-resource countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliability and validity of publicly available data from countries with poor data infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Observational nature of included studies and lack of clinical trials due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Not all studies have used a complete number of possible covariates in the analysis, potentially leading to limited findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding effect of covid-19 diagnosis testing considerations on outcomes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty of a country’s actual total number of infected individuals due to dependence on testing strategies and number of tests performed.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dismissal of contextual factors and merging of intervention results from different countries in the meta-analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact of harsh restrictions on the economy and people’s lives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Problems with universal access to vaccines and their effectiveness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of nphis effectiveness in different countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fomite transmission of human pathogenic viruses on surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Recontamination of surfaces after disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Efficacy of technology against specific viruses, such as coronavirus","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propagation of human coronavirus 229e in human lung fibroblast mrc-5 cell line","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Storage of hcov 229e stocks at -80°c","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enumeration of hcov 229e viral stocks using tcid50 technique","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of an unvalidated test method","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential cross-contamination during testing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate follow-up period after coating application","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of virus samples may lead to accidental exposure and transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of biophilic design, leading to a lack of nature-related features and patterns in the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient accessibility to nature-related features and spaces, limiting the potential health benefits of biophilic design.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider the impact of biophilic design on airborne disease transmission and contagion within the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to nature and natural elements in the built environment may lead to a lack of biophilic connections and reduced well-being.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for indoor air quality and ventilation may lead to the spread of airborne diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of water features may lead to the proliferation of waterborne diseases and microbial contamination.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of greenery maintenance may lead to the accumulation of allergens, pests, and pathogens, contributing to health hazards.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of explicit design strategies and guidelines for translating biophilic design into architectural design","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of validation for the effectiveness of biophilic design in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of financial matters and building technology in biophilic architecture","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of ’nature’ in architecture may not effectively mitigate contagious disease propagation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
